A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The main protagonist from the first movie of the trilogy is relegated to being a plot device to facilitate a "confrontation" between an uncharacteristically cynical Luke Skywalker and the film's half-hearted main antagonist.

A new character is introduced for the primary purpose of setting up a love dodecahedron between Ray and... everyone?

Finally\, the ace pilot Han Solo analogue (Po) from the first film is made out to be incompetent so that the heroic sacrifice of yet another newly introduced inconsequential character will have some meaning.
